lead_paragraph: When Jim Boeheim retires as coach at Syracuse, his longtime assistant, Mike Hopkins, will take over. Hopkins said that he and the university had reached an agreement making him the successor to Boeheim. Boeheim, 63, has a 750-264 record in 31 seasons. Hopkins, who played guard at Syracuse from 1988-93, is in his 13th season on Boeheim’s staff.
